title: Online English Learning Program Design Utilizing Developmental Teaching Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and practical experience in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Development of a customized online learning environment to enhance English proficiency required by science field professionals in workplace settings

learning_goals: Learners achieve intermediate-level English communication skills for science-related project execution
Learners achieve over 80% of step-by-step English learning objectives through developmentally appropriate instructional materials
Learners submit English project deliverables weekly via peer assessment in a PBL environment

resources: Online Collaboration Tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Miro)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
